description:
Cherry and Kotatsu-neko host a countdown of Japan`s favorite Urusei Yatsura episodes, followed by a special presentation of the nation`s favorite episode: After You`ve Gone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Urusei Yatsura Owakare Chokuzen Special: Kagayake!! Urusei Taishou
うる星やつらお別れ直前スペシャル 輝け!! うる星大賞
